Package jakarta.nosql.mapping

Interface Pagination

  • public interface Pagination
    Pagination is the process of separating print or digital content into discrete pages. This instance represents this pagination process.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  Pagination.PaginationBuilder
      The builder of Pagination
      static interface  Pagination.PaginationBuilderProvider
      A provider of Pagination.PaginationBuilder where it will create from the Long value

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      long getLimit()  
      long getPageNumber()
      Returns the page to be returned.
      long getPageSize()
      Returns the number of items to be returned.
      long getSkip()  
      Pagination next()
      Returns the Pagination requesting the next Pagination.
      static Pagination.PaginationBuilder page​(long page)
      A builder to Pagination, as the first step it defines the page number or the page index that starts from page one.
      Pagination unmodifiable()
      Returns a pagination instance that is read-only, in other words, that is not allowed to use the next().

    • Method Detail

      • getPageNumber

        long getPageNumber()
        Returns the page to be returned.
        Returns:
        the page to be returned.

      • getPageSize

        long getPageSize()
        Returns the number of items to be returned.
        Returns:
        the number of items of that page

      • getLimit

        long getLimit()
        Returns:
        The maximum number of results the select object was set to retrieve. According to the underlying page and page size.

      • getSkip

        long getSkip()
        Returns:
        The position of the first result the select object was set to retrieve. According to the underlying page and page size.

      • next

        Pagination next()
        Returns the Pagination requesting the next Pagination.
        Returns:
        the next pagination

      • unmodifiable

        Pagination unmodifiable()
        Returns a pagination instance that is read-only, in other words, that is not allowed to use the next().
        Returns:
        a read-onlye Pagination instance

      • page

        static Pagination.PaginationBuilder page​(long page)
        A builder to Pagination, as the first step it defines the page number or the page index that starts from page one.
        Parameters:
        page - the page index
        Returns:
        a new Pagination.PaginationBuilder instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when page is lesser equals than zero
